text: The 1903 Case football team represented the Case School of Applied Science in the American city of Cleveland, Ohio, now a part of Case Western Reserve University, during the 1903 college football season. The team's coach was Joseph Wentworth.http://athletics.case.edu/sports/spartan_club/bios/wentworth_joe Case won its second consecutive Ohio Athletic Conference title. ==Schedule== http://library.case.edu/ksl/collections/archives/seasons/cfoot1903/ ==References== Case Category:Case Western Reserve Spartans football seasons Case Football
title: 1903 Case football team
